message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,500 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $13,250. How about $12,750?
